scripts.load:parallel: npm run config:parallel && cypress run --headed --browser chrome
scripts.start:ci: docker run -d -p 80:80 --name adp_nuxt $CI_REGISTRY_IMAGE/$CI_COMMIT_REF_NAME:$CI_COMMIT_SHORT_SHA & npx wait-on http://172.17.0.2
scripts.test: npm run config && cypress run --headed --browser chrome
scripts.test:split: npm run config && cypress run --browser chrome --env split=true
